homeHeader.title: Plan Strategically, Expand Reach, & Gain Instant Global Recognition in the ADGM Free Zone
homeHeader.description: Position your business for success by capitalising on the region’s unmatched connectivity to fast-growing economies in the Middle East, Africa, and Asia. Access fully equipped offices, modern family trusts, and world-class lifestyle amenities with our seamless business setup solutions in Abu Dhabi Global Market Free Zone.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: What is the ADGM (Abu Dhabi Global Market) Free Zone?
items.answer: The ADGM Free Zone is one of the top international financial centres, empowering business owners and entrepreneurs with 100% foreign ownership and 0% import and export taxes.

items.question: How long does it take to register my ADGM company?
items.answer: Generally, it takes several working weeks to launch your ADGM company. Our experts streamline the process to help you set up your business within 5-7 business days.

items.question: Can I own properties in Dubai with my ADGM Free Zone company?
items.answer: Yes, the Dubai Land Department enables ADGM-registered businesses to expand, hold, and diversify properties in designated freehold areas.

items.question: Can expats own properties in Abu Dhabi Global Market?
items.answer: Yes, ADGM offers complete strategic ownership of your business, empowering you with full operational control.

items.question: Can One Nexuz help me set up a corporate bank account in ADGM?
items.answer: Yes, we connect you with the ideal bank partner aligned to your business needs to streamline your finances.
